title: Mahjong Hishouden: Naki no Ryuu
synopsis: The protagonist, Ryuu or Crying Dragon, is a mysterious man who often plays games with the gang members. He only wins by "ron," a move in which one needs to wait for the opponent's tile to complete the win.
related_anime: ['Mahjong Hishoden: Naki no Ryuu', 'Naki no Ryuu: Hiryuu no Shou (1991)']
staff: [['Yamaga, Hiroyuki', ['Script', ' Screenplay']], ['Maeda, Toshiaki', ['Theme Song Arrangement']], ['Gen, Tetsuya', ['Theme Song Composition']], ['Okada, Toshio', ['Planning']]]
